Twisted Eye.name: Twisted Eye
Twisted Eye.flavor: You flood the mind of your foe with psionic energy, befuddling its vision and distorting its perception of nearby threats. By increasing the flood to a torrent, you can blind the foe completely.
Twisted Eye.onHit: 1[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.
Twisted Eye.special: When making an opportunity attack, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Whirling Defense.name: Whirling Defense
Whirling Defense.flavor: Seeking to defend your friends, you attack your foe to get it to focus on you. By channeling more power into your attack, you can distract more opponents.
Whirling Defense.target: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Whirling Defense.onHit: 1[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and you mark the target until the end of your next turn.
Whirling Defense.effect: Whenever you use your mind spike before the end of your next turn, the target of that power takes extra damage equal to your Charisma modifier.

Steel Unity Strike.name: Steel Unity Strike
Steel Unity Strike.flavor: You become one with your weapon as you unleash a devastating attack against your foe, leaving yourself in position to strike again if your enemies flee.
Steel Unity Strike.effect: You assume the steel unity stance. Until the stance ends, you can use the Steel Unity Attack power.
Steel Unity Strike.requirement: The power Steel Unity Strike must be active in order to use this power.
Steel Unity Strike.trigger: An adjacent enemy marked by you moves without shifting on its turn

Feather Step.name: Feather Step
Feather Step.flavor: With a focused thought, you lift your body slightly off the ground on a current of psionic energy, allowing you to move over water or broken ground with ease.
Feather Step.effect: Until the end of this turn, you ignore difficult terrain and can both move across liquid and stand on it as if it were solid ground. In addition, you move 3 squares.

Spectral Legion.name: Spectral Legion
Spectral Legion.flavor: You trick your enemy into perceiving a legion of foes pressing in upon it. By expending more power, you can make the phantoms seem more real, causing the enemy to freeze in indecision.
Spectral Legion.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target is immobilized, and it grants combat advantage to your allies while they are adjacent to it.

Visions of Terror.name: Visions of Terror
Visions of Terror.flavor: With a sweeping attack, you trick your foe’s mind into seeing you as a monstrous figure whose blow sends the enemy stumbling back. You can expend more power to cause other foes to stagger back.
Visions of Terror.onHit: 1[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier. After the push, you slide each enemy adjacent to the target 1 square.

Demon Dance.name: Demon Dance
Demon Dance.flavor: As you slash your enemy, you implant the image of howling demons into its mind, distracting the foe from making attacks.
Demon Dance.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier psychic damage, and the target can’t make opportunity attacks until the end of your next turn.

Beckoning Strike.name: Beckoning Strike
Beckoning Strike.flavor: As you strike your enemy, you unleash a surge of psionic energy that warps the minds of the foes you challenge, compelling them to approach you.
Beckoning Strike.onHit: 1[W] + Constitution modifier damage. At the end of the target’s turn, you can use a free action to pull the target a number of squares equal to its speed.
Beckoning Strike.effect: You assume the beckoning stance. Until the stance ends, you can use the Beckoning Strike Attack power.
Beckoning Strike.requirement: The power Beckoning Strike must be active in order to use this power.
Beckoning Strike.trigger: An adjacent enemy marked by you moves without shifting on its turn

Nightmare Vortex.name: Nightmare Vortex
Nightmare Vortex.flavor: You generate a vortex of nightmares around yourself that engulfs the minds of your enemies, forcing your foes to move away from imagined attacks.
Nightmare Vortex.target: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Nightmare Vortex.onHit: 1[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and you slide the target 1 square.
Nightmare Vortex.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever an enemy starts its turn within 3 squares of you, you can slide the target 1 square as a free action.

Stag's Leap.name: Stag's Leap
Stag's Leap.flavor: You spring into the air, fueling your leap with your psionic magic.
Stag's Leap.effect: You make an Athletics check to jump with a +5 bonus. You are considered to have a running start.

Winged Weapon.name: Winged Weapon
Winged Weapon.flavor: You channel psionic energy into your weapon, adjusting the rules of nature so that the weapon will slide through the air as if on wings when you hurl it.
Winged Weapon.effect: Choose a weapon you are holding. The next melee attack you make with that weapon before the end of your next turn becomes a ranged attack with a range of 10. The weapon returns to your hand after you make that attack.

Lightning Rush.name: Lightning Rush
Lightning Rush.flavor: Like a lightning strike, you rush across the battlefield and launch a counterattack to help a friend. If you choose, you can draw the enemy’s attack to yourself.
Lightning Rush.trigger: An enemy within 5 squares of you targets an ally with an attack
Lightning Rush.effect: You get your normal standard action on your next turn.
Lightning Rush.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and you become the target of the triggering attack.

Psionic Speed.name: Psionic Speed
Psionic Speed.flavor: You move in a blur, making a series of quick attacks that force your opponents to regard you as a threat.
Psionic Speed.effect: You mark the target until the end of your next turn.

Inexorable Death Strike.name: Inexorable Death Strike
Inexorable Death Strike.flavor: You project a vision of your enemy’s death into the foe’s mind.
Inexorable Death Strike.onHit:
1[W] damage, and the target fails its first saving throw at the end of this turn.
Level 21: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage.
Inexorable Death Strike.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 5 psychic damage (save ends).
Inexorable Death Strike.effect: You assume the inexorable death stance. Until the stance ends, you can use the Inexorable Death Attack power.
Inexorable Death Strike.requirement: The power Inexorable Death Strike must be active in order to use this power.
Inexorable Death Strike.trigger: An adjacent enemy marked by you moves without shifting on its turn

Intellect Hammer.name: Intellect Hammer
Intellect Hammer.flavor: You hammer your foe’s intellect, draining power from it.
Intellect Hammer.onHit: 1[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn. In addition, you regain 2 power points.
Intellect Hammer.onMiss: Half damage. In addition, you regain 1 power point.

Guardian's Speed.name: Guardian's Speed
Guardian's Speed.flavor: As your ally reels from an attack, you act with the speed of thought to shield your friend from further assault.

Shadow Ally.name: Shadow Ally
Shadow Ally.flavor: Your form shimmers as you send a wave of psionic energy washing over your foes. In their minds, you fade away as your duplicate appears and threatens them.
Shadow Ally.effect:
You conjure an illusory duplicate of yourself in an unoccupied square within range. The duplicate lasts until the end of the encounter. You gain a +4 power bonus to all defenses against any attack that doesn’t include both you and the duplicate. As part of a move action, you can move the duplicate 5 squares.
The duplicate can be targeted by melee attacks and ranged attacks, although it lacks hit points. The duplicate disappears if a melee or a ranged attack deals any damage to it.

Brutal Barrage.name: Brutal Barrage
Brutal Barrage.flavor: You lash out with your weapon, slamming your foe again and again until you drive it into the ground.
Brutal Barrage.attack: Constitution vs. AC. Make the attack four times.
Brutal Barrage.effect: If you hit the target two or more times, it falls prone.

Luring Steel.name: Luring Steel
Luring Steel.flavor: Your strike delivers a pulse of psionic energy into your enemy, compelling it to attack you or suffer. By increasing the pulse’s strength, you can affect more enemies.
Luring Steel.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and you pull each enemy within 2 squares of you 1 square. As a free action, you can use your battlemind’s demand power against each enemy adjacent to you.
Luring Steel.effect: As above, but the enemy takes the damage when it hits or misses.

Intellect Sunder.name: Intellect Sunder
Intellect Sunder.flavor: Your attack devastates your foe’s mind, forcing the enemy to revert to its base instincts and focus its anger on you.
Intellect Sunder.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage. Whenever the target attacks, it can use only basic attacks and must include you as a target (save ends both).
Intellect Sunder.onMiss: Half damage. Until the end of your next turn, whenever the target attacks, it can use only basic attacks and must include you as a target.

Paralyzing Fear Strike.name: Paralyzing Fear Strike
Paralyzing Fear Strike.flavor: You wave your weapon in an intricate pattern, channeling psionic energy into it as you strike. Your foe is paralyzed with fear as it perceives a hellish scene of torment engulfing it.
Paralyzing Fear Strike.onHit:
1[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Level 21: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage.
Paralyzing Fear Strike.onMiss: Half damage, and the primary target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Paralyzing Fear Strike.effect: You assume the paralyzing fear stance. Until the stance ends, you can use the Paralyzing Fear Attack power.
Paralyzing Fear Strike.requirement: The power Paralyzing Fear Strike must be active in order to use this power.
Paralyzing Fear Strike.trigger: An adjacent enemy marked by you moves without shifting

Shield of the Iron Mind.name: Shield of the Iron Mind
Shield of the Iron Mind.flavor: You create a shield of psionic power that fortifies your allies.
Shield of the Iron Mind.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of the encounter. When you move, the zone moves with you, remaining centered on you. You and your allies gain a +4 power bonus to Will and saving throws while within the zone.

Sudden Rush.name: Sudden Rush
Sudden Rush.flavor: With a burst of psionic energy, you appear next to an enemy you have called out.
Sudden Rush.effect: You teleport to a square adjacent to a creature marked by you.

Battlemind's Demand.name: Battlemind's Demand
Battlemind's Demand.flavor: You draw your foe’s concentration, taunting the foe to strike at you.
Battlemind's Demand.target: One or two creatures in the burst
Battlemind's Demand.effect: You mark the target until you use this power again or until the end of the encounter.

Blurred Step.name: Blurred Step
Blurred Step.flavor: You bend reality with the power of your mind, flashing across the space between you and your enemy.
Blurred Step.trigger: An adjacent enemy marked by you shifts
Blurred Step.special: You can use this power only once per turn.

Mind Spike.name: Mind Spike
Mind Spike.flavor: You force your enemy to feel the pain that it inflicts on your friend.
Mind Spike.trigger: An adjacent enemy marked by you deals damage to your ally with an attack that doesn’t include you as a target
Mind Spike.effect: The target takes force and psychic damage equal to the damage that its attack dealt to your ally.

Speed of Thought.name: Speed of Thought
Speed of Thought.flavor: You move in the blink of an eye, reaching your foes before they can draw their weapons.
Speed of Thought.effect: You move a number of squares equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.
Speed of Thought.special: You can use this power even if you’re surprised.

Allies to Enemies.name: Allies to Enemies
Allies to Enemies.flavor: Your attack rattles your foe with a vision of its allies betraying it. The foe lashes out at a companion before realizing its mistake.
Allies to Enemies.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier psychic damage, and the target makes a melee basic attack as a free action against a creature of your choice.

Telepathic Challenge.name: Telepathic Challenge
Telepathic Challenge.flavor: You loom large in your foes’ minds, forcing the enemies to turn their attention toward you.
Telepathic Challenge.effect: You mark each target until the end of your next turn.

Step of the Pursuer.name: Step of the Pursuer
Step of the Pursuer.flavor: Your attack hammers your foe, allowing you to bind it with a psionic link that keeps your enemy close.
Step of the Pursuer.onHit: 3[W] + Constitution modifier damage. If the target moves away from you on its next turn, you can use a free action to teleport to a square adjacent to the target after its move.
Step of the Pursuer.keyword: The power gains the teleportation keyword.

Battle Vortex.name: Battle Vortex
Battle Vortex.flavor: Your attack creates a vortex that sends waves of psychic energy crashing over your enemies. By increasing the vortex’s intensity, you can move or lock down your foes.
Battle Vortex.onHit: 3[W] + Constitution modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, when any enemy starts its turn within 2 squares of you but ends its turn more than 2 squares away from you, you can teleport that enemy 3 squares as a free action, and it is immobilized until the end of its next turn.
Battle Vortex.keyword: The power gains the teleportation keyword.

Relentless Strike.name: Relentless Strike
Relentless Strike.flavor: You assume perfect positioning and strike with precision to leave a lasting wound. While in this stance, you can deliver a staggering blow to any enemy that tries to move away from you.
Relentless Strike.onHit:
1[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Level 21: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage.
Relentless Strike.effect: You assume the perfect storm stance. Until the stance ends, you can use the power Relentless Strike Attack.
Relentless Strike.requirement: The perfect storm stance from Relentless Strike must be active in order to use this power.
Relentless Strike.trigger: An adjacent enemy marked by you moves without shifting

Vengeful Mind.name: Vengeful Mind
Vengeful Mind.flavor: You shunt aside your wrath at seeing your friends attacked, focusing your rage to lend exacting precision to your attacks.
Vengeful Mind.effect: Until the end of the encounter, when the target attacks any ally of yours, you gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls against the target until the end of your next turn. If you already have the bonus when the target attacks an ally, the bonus increases by 1.

Armor of Blades.name: Armor of Blades
Armor of Blades.flavor: As your foe attacks your ally, you intervene to protect your friend.
Armor of Blades.trigger: An enemy adjacent to you targets one of your allies with a melee attack
Armor of Blades.onHit: 3[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and you slide the target 3 squares and shift 3 squares to a square adjacent to it. The target then attacks you instead of the ally.
Armor of Blades.effect: You get your normal standard action on your next turn.

Spring Assault.name: Spring Assault
Spring Assault.flavor: You leap toward your foe and unleash a fury of blows that overwhelm its defenses.
Spring Assault.attack: Constitution vs. AC. If you weren’t adjacent to the target at the start of this turn, the target grants combat advantage to you for this attack.
Spring Assault.onHit: 3[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and you are invisible to the target until the end of your next turn.

Indomitable Maneuver.name: Indomitable Maneuver
Indomitable Maneuver.flavor: Assessing your enemies’ weaknesses, you maneuver past your foes, positioning yourself to your best advantage.
Indomitable Maneuver.effect: You shift 12 squares and can move through enemies’ spaces during the shift.

Tactical Supremacy.name: Tactical Supremacy
Tactical Supremacy.flavor: You’re an avatar of battle, taking advantage of the slightest flaws in your enemies’ defenses to gain supremacy over them.
Tactical Supremacy.effect: Until the end of the encounter, enemies grant combat advantage to you.

Deadly Haste Strike.name: Deadly Haste Strike
Deadly Haste Strike.flavor: You weave through the battlefield, darting to a new foe after each strike with such speed that your enemies think they face an army.
Deadly Haste Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage. You shift half your speed and make a melee basic attack against a different enemy.
Deadly Haste Strike.effect: Before each attack but the first, you shift your speed. After making all the attacks, you assume the deadly haste stance. Until the stance ends, you can use the Deadly Haste Attack power.
Deadly Haste Strike.requirement: The power Deadly Haste Strike must be active in order to use this power.
Deadly Haste Strike.trigger: An adjacent enemy marked by you moves without shifting

Psychic Hammer.name: Psychic Hammer
Psychic Hammer.flavor: Your attack leaves your enemy unable to think clearly. With a subtle mental push, you can direct the enemy’s actions.
Psychic Hammer.onHit: 3[W] + Constitution modifier psychic damage, and the target is dominated (save ends). Until this domination ends, you can use a free action at the start of each of the target’s turns to slide the target a number of squares equal to its speed.
Psychic Hammer.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).

Brilliant Recovery.name: Brilliant Recovery
Brilliant Recovery.flavor: After missing your foe with an attack, you shift your grip on your weapon and make a quick follow-up strike.
Brilliant Recovery.target: An enemy you missed with an attack during this turn
Brilliant Recovery.onMiss: You regain the power points you spent to augment this power.

Cage of Cowardice.name: Cage of Cowardice
Cage of Cowardice.flavor: Your attack undermines your foe’s confidence in attacking anyone but you. Using more psionic energy, you can stun the foe.
Cage of Cowardice.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and the target is stunned until the end of your next turn.
Cage of Cowardice.special: When making an opportunity attack, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Mind-Sundering Burst.name: Mind-Sundering Burst
Mind-Sundering Burst.flavor: You unleash a burst of psychic energy as you spin and slash with your weapon, sending your foes reeling.
Mind-Sundering Burst.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage. You slide the target 3 squares to a square adjacent to you, and it is immobilized (save ends).
Mind-Sundering Burst.onMiss: Half damage, and the primary target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Mind-Sundering Burst.effect: You assume the mind-sundering stance. Until the stance ends, you can use the power Mind-Sundering Attack.
Mind-Sundering Burst.requirement: The power Mind-Sundering Burst must be active in order for you to use this power.
Mind-Sundering Burst.trigger: An adjacent enemy marked by you moves without shifting

Nova Strike.name: Nova Strike
Nova Strike.flavor: You erupt into a blur of motion and launch a devastating attack.
Nova Strike.onHit: 7[W] + Constitution modifier damage. If you have no power points remaining, the damage increases by 2[W].

Battle Resilience.name: Battle Resilience
Battle Resilience.flavor: You steel yourself for battle, girding yourself against your foe’s initial assault.
Battle Resilience.trigger: An attack hits or misses you for the first time during an encounter
Battle Resilience.effect:
Until the end of your next turn, you gain resistance to all damage equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Level 11: Resist 6 + your Wisdom modifier.
Level 21: Resist 9 + your Wisdom modifier.

Iron Fist.name: Iron Fist
Iron Fist.flavor: You change the density of your hand and arm to that of iron, allowing you to ward off your foe’s attacks.
Iron Fist.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain fire resistance equal to 5 + your Wisdom modifier.

Bull's Strength.name: Bull's Strength
Bull's Strength.flavor: You slam your foe back as if it were a puny goblin. By enhancing your strength further, you can reach enemies farther away or even swat multiple foes.
Bull's Strength.target: Each enemy you can see in the blast
Bull's Strength.onHit: 1[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square.
Bull's Strength.special: Your reach increases by 1 for this attack.

Aspect of Elevated Harmony.name: Aspect of Elevated Harmony
Aspect of Elevated Harmony.flavor: Your eyes glow as you achieve harmony of mind, body, and spirit. In this state, you are able to heal yourself, and you understand where to strike your enemy best and how to lessen its blows.
Aspect of Elevated Harmony.effect: You gain temporary hit points equal to 5 + your Wisdom modifier. In addition, choose a single creature hit by the at-will attack. That creature takes extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Psionic Anchor.name: Psionic Anchor
Psionic Anchor.flavor: You bind your foe with an anchor of psionic energy so that you can draw it back to your side with only a thought.
Psionic Anchor.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage. As a free action at the end of the target’s turn, you can teleport the target to a square adjacent to you (save ends).
Psionic Anchor.onMiss: Half damage. As a free action at the end of the target’s next turn, you can teleport the target to a square adjacent to you.

Psionic Vigor.name: Psionic Vigor
Psionic Vigor.flavor: You focus your mind to shrug off injuries.
Psionic Vigor.effect: You gain temporary hit points equal to 5 + your Charisma modifier.

Mind Snare.name: Mind Snare
Mind Snare.flavor: Your attack addles your foe, causing it to focus on you instead of on your friend. With a little more effort, you can force your enemy to focus solely on you.
Mind Snare.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, your allies are invisible to the target while they aren’t adjacent to it.

Mist Weapon.name: Mist Weapon
Mist Weapon.flavor: Your weapon transforms into mist, allowing your strikes to slide through armor, flesh, and ghostly essence. By adjusting the mist’s consistency, you can force ghostly creatures to become material.
Mist Weapon.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and the target doesn’t benefit from being insubstantial until the end of your next turn.

Aspect of Living Stone.name: Aspect of Living Stone
Aspect of Living Stone.flavor: You harden your flesh, becoming a living statue and delivering heavy blows that knock your foes to the ground.
Aspect of Living Stone.target: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Aspect of Living Stone.onHit: 1[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.
Aspect of Living Stone.effect: You gain resist 5 to all damage until the end of your next turn. In addition, choose a single creature hit by the at-will attack. That creature takes extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Predator to Prey.name: Predator to Prey
Predator to Prey.flavor: You unleash a wave of psionic energy that crushes your foe’s bravery, leaving the enemy overwhelmed with terror.
Predator to Prey.effect: The target’s reach is reduced by 1 (minimum 1), and whenever the target is hit, you can slide it 1 square as a free action (save ends both).

Psionic Ambush.name: Psionic Ambush
Psionic Ambush.flavor: You forge a mental link with your enemy and travel through a fold in space, appearing suddenly next to that enemy.
Psionic Ambush.effect: You teleport to a square adjacent to the target. The target grants combat advantage to you until the end of your turn.

Sense Minds.name: Sense Minds
Sense Minds.flavor: You stretch your senses outward, using your mind’s eye to look beyond the material world in search of living minds.
Sense Minds.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you know the location of all living creatures within 10 squares of you. Until this effect ends, you don’t grant combat advantage to those creatures, and if they have cover or concealment when you attack them, you don’t take the -2 penalty to attack rolls against them.

Ego Crush.name: Ego Crush
Ego Crush.flavor: Your strike delivers a torrent of psionic energy that addles your foe.
Ego Crush.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and the target cannot gain combat advantage until the end of your next turn.
Ego Crush.special: When making an opportunity attack, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Ghost in the Steel.name: Ghost in the Steel
Ghost in the Steel.flavor: Your weapon attack is merely a distraction from your true assault as you use a spike of psionic energy to cause your foe to harm itself.
Ghost in the Steel.onHit: 1[W] + Constitution modifier damage. The next time the target makes a melee attack before the end of your next turn, you can choose which creature it attacks (not including itself ).

Stone Squire.name: Stone Squire
Stone Squire.flavor: For an instant, you take on the weight of stone, allowing you to use your heavier mass to sweep your foe to the ground.
Stone Squire.onHit: 1[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.
Stone Squire.effect: After the attack, you shift 2 squares to a square adjacent to the target.

Aspect of Disembodiment.name: Aspect of Disembodiment
Aspect of Disembodiment.flavor: Your attack transforms both your enemy and yourself into a partially liquid form.
Aspect of Disembodiment.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and the target takes a penalty to attack rolls and saving throws equal to your Wisdom modifier (save ends). The penalty also ends if the target ends its turn without having made an attack during that turn.
Aspect of Disembodiment.effect: You shift half your speed before or after the attack. You can move through enemies’ spaces during this shift. In addition, choose a single creature hit by the at-will attack. That creature takes extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Iron Tomb.name: Iron Tomb
Iron Tomb.flavor: Psionic energy cascades from your weapon as you strike your foe, transforming the enemy into a statue of iron.
Iron Tomb.onHit: The target is stunned and immune to all damage but psychic damage (save ends both).
Iron Tomb.onMiss: The target is stunned and immune to all damage but psychic damage until the end of your next turn.

Whelm.name: Whelm
Whelm.flavor: You unleash a blast of crackling psionic energy as you strike, flinging your enemy back.
Whelm.onHit: 3[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and you push the target 2 squares.
Whelm.onMiss: Half damage, and you push the target 1 square.

Battle Aspect.name: Battle Aspect
Battle Aspect.flavor: You let the power of your mind run rampant, transforming yourself into a creature of pure psionic energy.
Battle Aspect.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain resist 5 to all damage and can teleport 3 squares as a move action.

Iron Warding.name: Iron Warding
Iron Warding.flavor: For a moment, your flesh becomes as hard as iron, and your foe’s attack bounces off you harmlessly.
Iron Warding.trigger: You take damage from an attack
Iron Warding.effect: The damage is reduced to 0, but you are subject to all other effects of the attack, if any.

Dizzying Strike.name: Dizzying Strike
Dizzying Strike.flavor: You strike your foe with crackling psionic energy, creating an intense vertigo in the foe that throws it off balance.
Dizzying Strike.onHit: 1[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Overwhelming Lunge.name: Overwhelming Lunge
Overwhelming Lunge.flavor: You lunge forward to attack your enemy, your reach magically extended.
Overwhelming Lunge.attack: As above, and you ignore the -2 penalty for attacking an enemy that has cover.
Overwhelming Lunge.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage. You slide each creature adjacent to the target 1 square and then slide the target 2 squares.

Web of Betrayal.name: Web of Betrayal
Web of Betrayal.flavor: You create a web of psionic energy around your foe that convinces it of its allies’ betrayal. By strengthening the web, you can compel your foe’s allies to meet those expectations.
Web of Betrayal.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier psychic damage. Until the end of your next turn, when any enemy attacks any ally of yours who is adjacent to the target, the enemy also makes the attack against the target.

Aspect of Enlightening Flame.name: Aspect of Enlightening Flame
Aspect of Enlightening Flame.flavor: As you attack your foes, you become the embodiment of flame in their eyes. With each strike, you inflict blistering wounds, which burn your enemies from within.
Aspect of Enlightening Flame.onHit: 3[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and ongoing 5 fire and psychic damage (save ends).
Aspect of Enlightening Flame.effect: Choose a single creature hit by the at-will attack. That creature takes extra fire and psychic damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Mind Blade.name: Mind Blade
Mind Blade.flavor: You lash out with your weapon and channel a burst of pain into your enemy’s mind. Though the blow doesn’t connect, your foe collapses as it feels the weapon strike a vital area.

Extend the Mind's Eye.name: Extend the Mind's Eye
Extend the Mind's Eye.flavor: You zero in your thoughts, snapping previously unseen details into focus within your mind’s eye.
Extend the Mind's Eye.effect: You gain a +5 power bonus to your next Insight check or Perception check during this encounter.

Mind of Endurance.name: Mind of Endurance
Mind of Endurance.flavor: You tap into your body’s natural healing abilities and mend your wounds.
Mind of Endurance.effect: You spend a healing surge. In addition, until the end of the encounter, you have regeneration 5 while you’re bloodied.

Dazzling Assault.name: Dazzling Assault
Dazzling Assault.flavor: Your foe attempts to slip away from you, but you attack in a blur of movement, sending your enemy in another direction and binding it with psionic energy.
Dazzling Assault.trigger: An adjacent enemy marked by you shifts
Dazzling Assault.onHit: 3[W] + Constitution modifier damage. You slide the target 2 squares, and it is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Dazzling Assault.effect: You get your normal standard action on your next turn.

Entangling Weapon.name: Entangling Weapon
Entangling Weapon.flavor: You imbue your attack with psionic energy, allowing you to strike precisely and forcing your opponent to move as you dictate.
Entangling Weapon.onHit: 3[W] + Constitution modifier damage. When you hit any enemy before the end of your next turn, you slide that enemy 2 squares.

Festering Wound.name: Festering Wound
Festering Wound.flavor: You strike and slash, opening wounds both physical and mental, which flare with pain as you press the attack.
Festering Wound.onHit: 3[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and your next psionic attack against the target before the end of your next turn deals 1d6 extra psychic damage.

Aspect of Stolen Identity.name: Aspect of Stolen Identity
Aspect of Stolen Identity.flavor: You repeatedly transform yourself into simulacra of your enemies. Through these forms, you can cause your enemies to harm themselves.
Aspect of Stolen Identity.effect: Choose a single creature hit by the at-will attack, and choose a melee basic attack of that creature. The creature then hits itself with that melee basic attack as a free action.

Mind Wrack.name: Mind Wrack
Mind Wrack.flavor: You drive a psionic spike of pain into your enemy’s mind. Each time you land a blow thereafter, the spike reverberates, causing your foe increased agony.
Mind Wrack.effect: The target takes ongoing 5 psychic damage (save ends). Whenever you hit the target before this ongoing damage ends, the ongoing damage increases by 5.

Immortal Endurance.name: Immortal Endurance
Immortal Endurance.flavor: You draw on deep reserves of psionic energy to shrug off even the most terrible wounds.
Immortal Endurance.effect: You gain temporary hit points equal to your bloodied value.

Perfect Eye.name: Perfect Eye
Perfect Eye.flavor: You cast your mind out, ignoring all barriers to find your foes.
Perfect Eye.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you ignore all barriers to line of effect and line of sight that are within 20 squares of you. In addition, you ignore the -2 penalty for attacking enemies that have concealment or cover within that range.

Might of the Ogre.name: Might of the Ogre
Might of the Ogre.flavor: You imbue yourself with the strength of an ogre as you unleash a strike that fells your foe, making it an easy target for your allies.
Might of the Ogre.onHit: 3[W] damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn. You knock the target prone, and if it stands up before the end of your next turn, it provokes opportunity attacks for doing so.

Press of Battle.name: Press of Battle
Press of Battle.flavor: Your psionic assault presses in on your foe, inhibiting its ability to maneuver.
Press of Battle.onHit: 3[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and the target is immobilized and grants combat advantage to your allies until the end of your next turn.

Veil of the Mind's Eye.name: Veil of the Mind's Eye
Veil of the Mind's Eye.flavor: You release a flash of psionic energy in your foe’s mind, clouding the foe’s vision. You can strengthen the flash to disrupt the foe’s vision further.
Veil of the Mind's Eye.onHit: 3[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.

Aspect of Luminous Thought.name: Aspect of Luminous Thought
Aspect of Luminous Thought.flavor: Your mind and body become one as you execute the perfect attack and transform yourself into a being of pure thought.
Aspect of Luminous Thought.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +2 bonus to all defenses against the targets of the at-will attack. In addition, choose a single creature hit by the at-will attack. That creature takes extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Vitality Theft.name: Vitality Theft
Vitality Theft.flavor: Your punishing attack establishes a brief psionic link with your foe that saps its mental energy and renews your own.

Mind of Mirrors.name: Mind of Mirrors
Mind of Mirrors.flavor: You engulf your foe’s mind with images that hinder the enemy’s perception of its enemies. By making the images more real, you can manipulate your enemy into attacking those you choose.
Mind of Mirrors.onHit: 3[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and the target is dominated until the end of your next turn. Until this domination ends, the target has combat advantage against itself and your enemies.

Psionic Storm.name: Psionic Storm
Psionic Storm.flavor: You unleash a storm of psionic power that damages your foe and enhances your ability to force enemies to deal with you first or pay a heavy price.
Psionic Storm.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you can use your mind spike power as a free action, and it deals extra damage equal to 5 + your Wisdom modifier.

Aspect of Annihilation.name: Aspect of Annihilation
Aspect of Annihilation.flavor: You imbue yourself with destructive magic as you strike your enemy, disrupting its substance for a time.
Aspect of Annihilation.onHit: 3[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and ongoing 20 damage (save ends).
Aspect of Annihilation.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 10 damage (save ends).
Aspect of Annihilation.effect: The target of the at-will attack fails its first saving throw before the end of your next turn. In addition, choose a single creature hit by the at-will attack. That creature takes extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Fatal Barrage.name: Fatal Barrage
Fatal Barrage.flavor: Sensing your foe’s defenses, you lash out at the weakest point with unnatural speed and grace, delivering a deadly strike.
Fatal Barrage.onHit: 6[W] + Constitution modifier damage. The damage increases by 5 for each effect on the target that a save can end.
Fatal Barrage.onMiss: Half damage. The damage increases by 2 for each effect on the target that a save can end.

Wild Focus.name: Wild Focus
Wild Focus.flavor: Using a surge of telekinetic power, you yank an enemy toward you, forcing it to fight.
Wild Focus.trigger: An enemy starts its first turn during an encounter.
Wild Focus.target: The triggering enemy in the burst
Wild Focus.effect: You pull the target a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier and mark it until the end of your next turn.

Concussive Spike.name: Concussive Spike
Concussive Spike.flavor: Your weapon shimmers with force as you bring it crashing down, clobbering your foes and driving some of them back.
Concussive Spike.target: One creature you can see in the burst
Concussive Spike.onHit: 1[W] + Constitution modifier force damage, and you knock the target prone. You push each enemy in the blast other than the target a number of squares equal to 1 + your Charisma modifier.

Corona of Floating Force.name: Corona of Floating Force
Corona of Floating Force.flavor: As you swing, the air around you ripples with psionic force that knocks back your enemy and levitates you.
Corona of Floating Force.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier force damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier.
Corona of Floating Force.onMiss: Half damage, and you push the target 1 square.
Corona of Floating Force.effect: You can assume the floating force stance. Until the stance ends, you ignore difficult terrain and take no damage from hindering terrain or terrain hazards.

Concussive Response.name: Concussive Response
Concussive Response.flavor: With a thought, you transform your injuries into energy that bolsters your attacks.
Concussive Response.effect: Until the end of your next turn, your unaugmented psionic attacks deal 1d6 extra force damage.

Wrenching Claw.name: Wrenching Claw
Wrenching Claw.flavor: You manifest a claw of force around your weapon. Then, as you strike, the claw encloses your foe and drags it into position.
Wrenching Claw.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier force damage, and you slide the target 3 squares to a square adjacent to you.
Wrenching Claw.special: Your reach increases by a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier for this attack.

Wild Speed.name: Wild Speed
Wild Speed.flavor: Your strike warps temporal bonds, sapping your opponent’s speed and infusing you with unpredictable bursts of movement.
Wild Speed.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier force damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).
Wild Speed.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Wild Speed.effect: After the attack, you shift half your speed to a square adjacent to the target. You can assume the wild speed stance. Until the stance ends, you can move a number of squares equal to your speed + 1d4 as a move action. You roll a d4 each time you begin the movement. If the result is odd, the movement doesn’t provoke opportunity attacks.

Surging Durability.name: Surging Durability
Surging Durability.flavor: With each attack, you use the power of your mind to bolster your vitality.
Surging Durability.effect: You assume the stance of surging durability. Until the stance ends, whenever you hit with an augmented power, you gain temporary hit points equal to the number of power points you spent to augment that power.

Forceful Reversal.name: Forceful Reversal
Forceful Reversal.flavor: You draw the force from an enemy’s attack and hurl it back at your attacker through your weapon.
Forceful Reversal.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier force damage. You push the target a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier and knock it prone. The target cannot stand up until the start of its next turn.
Forceful Reversal.effect: You get your normal standard action on your turn.

Cascade of Rippling Force.name: Cascade of Rippling Force
Cascade of Rippling Force.flavor: Your weapon and body flare with telekinetic energy as you attack. Afterward, waves of force roll off your body.
Cascade of Rippling Force.effect: You shift 3 squares. During this movement, you can move through the spaces of enemies marked by you. If you do so, the first time you enter an enemy’s space during the shift, that enemy takes force damage equal to your Charisma modifier.
Cascade of Rippling Force.requirement: The power Cascade of Rippling Force must be active in order to use this power.

Hands of the Titan.name: Hands of the Titan
Hands of the Titan.flavor: Your arms bulge with strength, and your weapon ripples with elemental energy as your mind draws from a deep font of power.
Hands of the Titan.effect: Until the end of your next turn, your weapon attacks deal extra damage equal to your Charisma modifier and deal cold, fire, lightning, and thunder damage in addition to their normal damage types.

Kinetic Fist.name: Kinetic Fist
Kinetic Fist.flavor: The energy from your attack causes swirling force to gather about you, which you can unleash on an attacker.
Kinetic Fist.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and one enemy marked by you other than the target takes force damage equal to your Charisma modifier.
Kinetic Fist.effect: Until the end of your next turn, when an enemy adjacent to you hits and damages you, that enemy takes force damage equal to 5 + your Charisma modifier, and you mark it until the end of the enemy’s next turn.

Aspect of the Desert Storm.name: Aspect of the Desert Storm
Aspect of the Desert Storm.flavor: Your enemy flies back from your attack, and before it lands, you exchange positions so you can lash out against other foes.
Aspect of the Desert Storm.effect: You push the primary target 5 squares and knock it prone. In addition, you and the primary target teleport, swapping positions. If you teleport, you then make a secondary attack that is a close burst 1.
Aspect of the Desert Storm.secondaryTarget: Each enemy you can see in the burst other than the primary target
Aspect of the Desert Storm.secondaryOnHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and the secondary target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Savage Intent.name: Savage Intent
Savage Intent.flavor: You fix your enemies in your mind’s eye, allowing you to swiftly react to their movement.
Savage Intent.target: Each enemy marked by you in the burst
Savage Intent.effect: Until the end of your next turn, when the target completes a willing move without teleporting, you can shift an equal number of squares as a free action.

Ruinous Grasp.name: Ruinous Grasp
Ruinous Grasp.flavor: When your strike connects, you seize the mind of a nearby foe and gain limited control over the enemy’s movement.
Ruinous Grasp.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier. In addition, until the end of your next turn, the target is immobilized and you can use a free action to slide the target 1 square whenever you take damage.
Ruinous Grasp.effect: After the attack, you shift 1 square and gain a +2 power bonus to one defense of your choice until the end of your next turn.

Indomitable Presence.name: Indomitable Presence
Indomitable Presence.flavor: Your wrath burns so hot it warps the air around you, causing your attackers to recoil in pain.
Indomitable Presence.onHit: 3[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and the target takes 1d6 extra force and psychic damage from your attacks, not including this one (save ends).
Indomitable Presence.effect: Until the end of your next turn, any enemy that hits you takes 1d10 force and psychic damage, and you can push that enemy 1 square.

Psychic Feast.name: Psychic Feast
Psychic Feast.flavor: You devour your enemy’s anguish as you deliver a killing blow.
Psychic Feast.trigger: You reduce a nonminion enemy to 0 hit points.
Psychic Feast.effect: You gain temporary hit points equal to your healing surge value.

Blade Tremor.name: Blade Tremor
Blade Tremor.flavor: You clobber your foe with a pulverizing blow. As the enemy staggers, you wrack the earth with a wave of power that knocks down nearby foes.
Blade Tremor.target: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Blade Tremor.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and you knock the target prone. In addition, one enemy marked by you and within 5 squares of you falls prone.

Corona of the Sunsphere.name: Corona of the Sunsphere
Corona of the Sunsphere.flavor: Your weapon’s arc carves a red orb of force that sears your foes and sends them tumbling away.
Corona of the Sunsphere.onHit: 5[W] + Constitution modifier fire damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier.
Corona of the Sunsphere.onMiss: Half damage, and you push the target 2 squares.
Corona of the Sunsphere.requirement: The power Corona of the Sunsphere must be active in order to use this power.
Corona of the Sunsphere.trigger: An enemy that started its turn adjacent to you willingly moves away from you or makes an attack that doesn’t include you as a target during that turn.

Focused Rampage.name: Focused Rampage
Focused Rampage.flavor: You tear through your opponent with one mighty blow. The strike helps focus your mind, bolstering you and improving your prowess.
Focused Rampage.onHit: 6[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and you gain temporary hit points equal to 10 + your Constitution modifier.
Focused Rampage.onMiss: Half damage, and you gain temporary hit points equal to 5 + your Constitution modifier.
Focused Rampage.effect: You can assume the focused rampage stance. Until the stance ends, you can use any of your at-will unaugmented psionic attack powers in place of melee basic attacks.

Persistent Harrier.name: Persistent Harrier
Persistent Harrier.flavor: You slip the bonds of space to strike back at even a distant opponent.
Persistent Harrier.trigger: An enemy hits or misses you with an attack for the first time during an encounter
Persistent Harrier.special: You can attack the target with this melee attack even if the target is outside your melee reach.
Persistent Harrier.onHit:
1[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and you teleport to a square adjacent to the enemy.
    Level 21: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage.

Conductive Defense.name: Conductive Defense
Conductive Defense.flavor: Your attack surrounds a foe with a shroud of crackling lightning, threatening retribution for strikes against your allies.
Conductive Defense.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier lightning damage. Until the start of your next turn, the target takes lightning damage equal to your Constitution modifier whenever it hits one of your allies.

Renewed Focus.name: Renewed Focus
Renewed Focus.flavor: By the power of your mind, you shrug off effects that would keep you away from your foes.
Renewed Focus.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage. You are no longer immobilized, marked, or slowed, and you cannot be immobilized, marked, or slowed until the end of your next turn.

Vicious Cobra Strike.name: Vicious Cobra Strike
Vicious Cobra Strike.flavor: In your foe’s mind, your weapon takes the form of a hissing serpent, its strike hindering that enemy’s attacks against you.
Vicious Cobra Strike.target: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Vicious Cobra Strike.onHit: 1[W] + Constitution modifier psychic damage, and the target is marked and takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

World-Slipping Advance.name: World-Slipping Advance
World-Slipping Advance.flavor: You slip unfettered across the battlefield to gain an advantageous position.
World-Slipping Advance.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and you teleport to a square adjacent to the target.

Accelerating Strike.name: Accelerating Strike
Accelerating Strike.flavor: When you surge toward a foe, the momentum of your attack carries you through the rest of combat.
Accelerating Strike.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +2 power bonus to speed. In addition, when you shift, you shift 1 extra square.
Accelerating Strike.attack: Constitution vs. AC. You have combat advantage for this attack.
Accelerating Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage. Your movement does not provoke opportunity attacks from the target until the end of the encounter.

Aspect of Bitter Ice.name: Aspect of Bitter Ice
Aspect of Bitter Ice.flavor: Your weapon is rimed with ice as you strike. In the aftermath, you are imbued with a bitter cold that protects you and slows your enemies.
Aspect of Bitter Ice.target: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Aspect of Bitter Ice.onHit: 1[W] + Constitution modifier cold damage, you push the target 1 square, and the target is immobilized (save ends).
Aspect of Bitter Ice.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).
Aspect of Bitter Ice.effect: Until the start of your next turn, any enemy that starts its turn adjacent to you is slowed until the end of its turn.

Living Fortress.name: Living Fortress
Living Fortress.flavor: As you lash out at your foe, a shroud of rock and scree rises from the ground to protect you.
Living Fortress.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you and allies adjacent to you have cover. As a minor action, you can end this effect to gain resist 5 to all damage until the start of your next turn.

Stolen Grace.name: Stolen Grace
Stolen Grace.flavor: Your foe’s movement wracks it with psychic pain in the aftermath of your attack, even as your own mobility is heightened.
Stolen Grace.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and the target takes 5 psychic damage if it moves more than half its speed when it moves (save ends).
Stolen Grace.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Stolen Grace.effect: You assume the stolen grace stance. Until the stance ends, you gain a +4 power bonus to AC and Reflex against opportunity attacks and a +2 power bonus to opportunity attack rolls.

Dimension Slide.name: Dimension Slide
Dimension Slide.flavor: You bend the space around you to better position yourself and an ally on the battlefield.
Dimension Slide.effect: You slide one target 1 square and teleport the other target 3 squares.

Evade Explosion.name: Evade Explosion
Evade Explosion.flavor: A prescient vision of destruction allows you to sidestep the worst effects of an attack.
Evade Explosion.trigger: A close or an area attack hits you
Evade Explosion.effect: You shift 1 square. If the shift places you outside the area of the triggering attack, you take only half damage from the attack.

Oaken Resilience.name: Oaken Resilience
Oaken Resilience.flavor: As your mind envisions the strength of the oak, your body acquires that tree’s ancient resilience.
Oaken Resilience.effect: You gain resist 3 to all damage until the end of the encounter.

Wild Savagery.name: Wild Savagery
Wild Savagery.flavor: You summon the beast within, gaining the power to send unwary foes sprawling.
Wild Savagery.requirement: The power Wild Savagery must be active in order to use this attack.
Wild Savagery.effect: Make a melee basic attack or a charge attack against the triggering enemy. On a hit, the enemy is also knocked prone.
Wild Savagery.trigger: An enemy marked by you deals damage to an ally with an attack that doesn’t include you as a target.

Cast the Net.name: Cast the Net
Cast the Net.flavor: Your attack bends the fabric of space, drawing your enemy to a more advantageous position.
Cast the Net.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and you teleport the target to a square adjacent to you. If the target moves more than 2 squares on its next turn, you can teleport it to a square adjacent to you as an immediate reaction.

Harrier's Dance.name: Harrier's Dance
Harrier's Dance.flavor: Your successful attack empowers you, letting you slip the bonds of space in response to a foe’s assault.
Harrier's Dance.effect: Whenever you take damage before the start of your next turn, you can teleport 3 squares as a free action.

Lodestone Lure.name: Lodestone Lure
Lodestone Lure.flavor: As you raise your weapon, a foe lurches toward you against its will.
Lodestone Lure.onHit: 1[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and you must pull the target 4 squares and knock it prone. Until the end of your next turn, the target can move only to squares that are adjacent to you.

Momentum Swing.name: Momentum Swing
Momentum Swing.flavor: Your vicious attack lets you swing away from the target, ready to strike the next foe.
Momentum Swing.effect: Make a charge attack against a creature other than the target. Movement made as part of the charge does not provoke opportunity attacks.

Aspect of Unspeakable Horror.name: Aspect of Unspeakable Horror
Aspect of Unspeakable Horror.flavor: Your attack heralds your transformation into a nightmare creature whose appearance cripples your enemies with fear.
Aspect of Unspeakable Horror.onHit: 1[W] + Constitution modifier damage plus 1d12 psychic damage.
Aspect of Unspeakable Horror.effect: Each target of the at-will attack takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Empathic Feedback.name: Empathic Feedback
Empathic Feedback.flavor: Your counterattack sends foes reeling away from you while your vigor is temporarily replenished.
Empathic Feedback.trigger: You take damage from an attack
Empathic Feedback.onHit: 1[W] + Constitution modifier psychic damage, and you push the target 3 squares.
Empathic Feedback.onMiss: Half damage, and you push the target 1 square.
Empathic Feedback.effect: You gain temporary hit points equal to one-half your level + your Constitution modifier.

Fated Confrontation.name: Fated Confrontation
Fated Confrontation.flavor: You warp fate to take the place of another creature on the battlefield, deliver a brutal attack against an unsuspecting enemy, and then return to your original position.
Fated Confrontation.effect: You teleport yourself and the primary target, swapping positions. Make a secondary attack that is a melee weapon attack.
Fated Confrontation.secondaryOnHit: 3[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and you mark the secondary target until the end of your next turn.
Fated Confrontation.secondaryOnMiss: Half damage, and you mark the secondary target until the end of your next turn.
Fated Confrontation.secondaryeffect: You teleport yourself and the primary target, swapping positions.

Inconstant Location.name: Inconstant Location
Inconstant Location.flavor: Your attack opens up ripples in space, letting you slip from place to place to stay one step ahead of your foes.
Inconstant Location.effect: You assume the inconstant location stance. Until the stance ends, you can teleport 2 squares as a free action.
Inconstant Location.special: You can take this free action only as the first or the last action of your turn.

Energy Transformation.name: Energy Transformation
Energy Transformation.flavor: The force of an opponent’s attack is shunted through you as brilliant white light.
Energy Transformation.trigger: You take damage from an attack.
Energy Transformation.effect: You take half damage from the triggering attack. Until the end of the encounter, you radiate bright light that fills your space and all squares within 5 squares of you.

Mental Triumph.name: Mental Triumph
Mental Triumph.flavor: By the power of your mind, you shrug off the most potent physical effects.
Mental Triumph.effect: You cannot be slowed, immobilized, or restrained until the end of the encounter.

Relentless Hostility.name: Relentless Hostility
Relentless Hostility.flavor: Even before your foe drops, you slip away in search of another victim.
Relentless Hostility.trigger: You reduce an enemy to 0 hit points during your turn
Relentless Hostility.special: You can use this power once during each of your turns.

Warning Premonition.name: Warning Premonition
Warning Premonition.flavor: A premonition of danger flashes through your mind, letting you take the fight to a foe that thought it had the drop on you.
Warning Premonition.effect: You are no longer surprised. In addition, you shift half your speed and mark one creature adjacent to you at the end of the shift until the end of your next turn.

Body Double.name: Body Double
Body Double.flavor: You bend space to temporarily stand in two places at once, becoming a double threat to your enemies.
Body Double.onHit: 2[W] damage, and choose any square within 5 squares of you. You occupy that square in addition to your normal square until the start of your next turn. While you occupy multiple squares through this power, you can attack from either square. You can flank from either square and can flank with yourself. You can be targeted in either square, but close and area attacks that affect both squares target you only once. When the effect ends, you choose whether to occupy your original square or your double’s square.

Flowing Weapon.name: Flowing Weapon
Flowing Weapon.flavor: As you swing your weapon, it ripples and flows to reach a distant foe.
Flowing Weapon.onHit: 1[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and you pull the target 4 squares.

Give Chase.name: Give Chase
Give Chase.flavor: Your attack keeps an enemy’s attention on you as you stay in motion around it.
Give Chase.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and you mark the target until the end of your next turn.
Give Chase.effect: If the target triggers your blurred step power before the end of your next turn, you can teleport 5 squares with that power instead of shifting.

Violent Ubiquity.name: Violent Ubiquity
Violent Ubiquity.flavor: Your attack keeps the target off balance, as either it or one of your allies swap positions in a violent wrenching of reality.
Violent Ubiquity.onHit: 1[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and you mark the target until the end of your next turn. You then teleport yourself and one ally within 5 squares of you, swapping positions.

Baleful Teleport.name: Baleful Teleport
Baleful Teleport.flavor: A crippling strike shunts your foe across the battlefield, then leaves it dazed.
Baleful Teleport.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and you teleport the target 5 squares. The target is then dazed (save ends).
Baleful Teleport.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Lion's Charge.name: Lion's Charge
Lion's Charge.flavor: You make springing charge attacks against two foes, even as you set your sights on a third.
Lion's Charge.requirement: You must charge and use this power in place of a melee basic attack.
Lion's Charge.effect: If either attack hits, you can repeat the attack against a third creature, with a +2 bonus to the attack roll.

Shattered Time.name: Shattered Time
Shattered Time.flavor: Your weapon attack disrupts the flow of time around you, allowing you to harry your foes’ attempts to attack your allies.
Shattered Time.effect: Before the attack, you shift to any unoccupied square adjacent to the triggering enemy that is within the zone.
Shattered Time.requirement: The power Shattered Time must be active in order to use this power.
Shattered Time.trigger: An enemy within the zone makes an attack that does not include you as a target
Shattered Time.secondaryOnHit: 1[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and you mark the secondary target until the end of your next turn.

Strength of my Enemy.name: Strength of my Enemy
Strength of my Enemy.flavor: When your attack weakens a foe, its fleeting strength drives your fury in battle.
Strength of my Enemy.onHit: Constitution modifier damage, and the target is weakened (save ends).
Strength of my Enemy.onMiss: The target is weakened until the end of your next turn.
Strength of my Enemy.effect: While the target is weakened from this attack, your melee attacks deal 2d6 extra damage.

Hone Weapon.name: Hone Weapon
Hone Weapon.flavor: You channel psionic power through your weapon, granting it a brutal advantage in battle.
Hone Weapon.effect: Until the end of the encounter, the weapon gains the brutal 1 property. In addition, critical hits with the weapon deal 1d10 extra damage.

Subjective Gravity.name: Subjective Gravity
Subjective Gravity.flavor: By altering reality, you ignore the effects of gravity as you move.
Subjective Gravity.effect: Until the stance ends, you can move across any horizontal or vertical surface without having to climb. You can walk on walls and ceilings as if they were floors. You fall if you end the stance while on a surface on which you could not normally stand.

Ubiquitous Vision.name: Ubiquitous Vision
Ubiquitous Vision.flavor: Your entire body becomes an extension of your eyes.
Ubiquitous Vision.effect: Until the end of the encounter, enemies cannot gain combat advantage by flanking you, and you gain a +5 power bonus to Perception checks.

Uncanny Senses.name: Uncanny Senses
Uncanny Senses.flavor: Foes try in vain to hide from your heightened senses.
Uncanny Senses.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you can see invisible creatures and objects, and you gain a +5 power bonus to Insight checks and Perception checks.

Intellect Snap.name: Intellect Snap
Intellect Snap.flavor: Your weapon channels your psychic fury to distract and hinder your foe.
Intellect Snap.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier psychic damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn. In addition, you or one ally within 5 squares of you can make a saving throw against an effect that dazes or stuns.

Kinetic Shield.name: Kinetic Shield
Kinetic Shield.flavor: Your attack summons up a psionic shield that protects nearby allies.
Kinetic Shield.trigger: An enemy hits you or an ally with an attack
Kinetic Shield.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier force damage, and each ally adjacent to you gains a +2 power bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.
Kinetic Shield.effect: You have your normal standard action on your next turn.

Parting Shot.name: Parting Shot
Parting Shot.flavor: You move through your enemies like a shadow, striking hard with your weapon as you slip away.
Parting Shot.effect: You shift your speed and can move through enemies’ spaces during this movement. Make the following attack against one enemy adjacent to you at any point during this movement.
Parting Shot.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and you mark the target until the end of your next turn.

Unwavering Concentration.name: Unwavering Concentration
Unwavering Concentration.flavor: Your attack focuses your mind and body to shield you from counterattacks.
Unwavering Concentration.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage. You gain a power bonus to all defenses equal to your Wisdom modifier until the end of your next turn.

Aspect of the Raging Tempest.name: Aspect of the Raging Tempest
Aspect of the Raging Tempest.flavor: Lightning flares around the creature you strike, feeding back to grant you the power of the raging tempest.
Aspect of the Raging Tempest.target: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Aspect of the Raging Tempest.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and ongoing 5 lightning damage (save ends).
Aspect of the Raging Tempest.effect: When you hit with the at-will attack, you slide one enemy marked by you 1 square. That enemy then takes thunder damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Crushing Wave Strike.name: Crushing Wave Strike
Crushing Wave Strike.flavor: Your weapon attack is followed up by a blast of psionic power that knocks creatures to the ground.
Crushing Wave Strike.effect: Make a secondary attack that is a close blast 5, and that must include the primary target as a target.
Crushing Wave Strike.secondaryOnHit: 10 + Constitution modifier force damage, and you push the secondary target 2 squares and knock it prone.

Precognitive Eye.name: Precognitive Eye
Precognitive Eye.flavor: Your attack inspires an enemy to focus on you in combat, and lets you use flashes of the future to distance yourself from your foes.
Precognitive Eye.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and you mark the target until the end of the encounter. No other mark can supersede this mark unless you permit it.
Precognitive Eye.onMiss: Half damage, and you mark the target until the end of your next turn.
Precognitive Eye.effect: You assume the precognitive eye stance. Until the stance ends, whenever any enemy marked by you moves, you can shift 1 square as a free action. In addition, you gain a +1 power bonus to attack rolls against enemies marked by you.

Sonic Burst.name: Sonic Burst
Sonic Burst.flavor: You move with the speed of thunder, blasting your foes as you pass.
Sonic Burst.effect: You shift twice your speed and make the following attack at any point during this movement.
Sonic Burst.onHit: 3[W] + Constitution modifier thunder damage, you push the target 3 squares, and the target is deafened (save ends).
Sonic Burst.onMiss: Half damage, and you push the target 1 square.

Inertial Barrier.name: Inertial Barrier
Inertial Barrier.flavor: An attack against you triggers a psionic barrier that shields you and your allies from harm.
Inertial Barrier.trigger: You or an ally adjacent to you is hit by an attack
Inertial Barrier.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. You and your allies gain resist 5 to all damage while within the zone. Any enemy that starts or ends its turn within the zone is pushed 1 square from the center of the zone. The zone is difficult terrain for enemies.

Instant Move.name: Instant Move
Instant Move.flavor: You blur across the battlefield to move into position for an attack, or to flee an enemy’s retribution.
Instant Move.special: You can use this power only as the first or the last action of your turn.

Resolute Recovery.name: Resolute Recovery
Resolute Recovery.flavor: You shrug off a debilitating effect as you revitalize yourself in the midst of combat.
Resolute Recovery.effect: You gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier + one-half your level and remove one effect that a save can end. You then shift 1 square.

Teleport Trigger.name: Teleport Trigger
Teleport Trigger.flavor: You warp space around you, creating a means of quick escape for you and your allies.
Teleport Trigger.effect: You conjure four shimmering teleport triggers in unoccupied squares within range. Each teleport trigger lasts until the end of the encounter or until expended. When you or an ally enters a square containing a teleport trigger, that character can expend the trigger as a free action to teleport 5 squares.

Cloud of Dancing Blades.name: Cloud of Dancing Blades
Cloud of Dancing Blades.flavor: A field of spectral blades fills the air around you, increasing your retribution against a foe that harms your allies.
Cloud of Dancing Blades.onHit: 1[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and your mind spike power deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier until the end of your next turn.
Cloud of Dancing Blades.effect: Before the attack, you shift 4 squares to an unoccupied square adjacent to the triggering enemy.
Cloud of Dancing Blades.requirement: The power Cloud of Dancing Blades must be active in order to use this power.
Cloud of Dancing Blades.trigger: An enemy willingly leaves the zone
Cloud of Dancing Blades.secondaryOnHit: The secondary target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Dancing Strike.name: Dancing Strike
Dancing Strike.flavor: In the aftermath of your attack, you deftly stay ahead of your foes’ ttempts to move around you.
Dancing Strike.onHit: 3[W] + Constitution modifier damage. When you use your blurred step power before the end of your next turn, you can shift a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier instead of shifting 1 square, and the creature that triggers your blurred step takes 5 force and psychic damage.

Gravity Well.name: Gravity Well
Gravity Well.flavor: Your attack constrains a foe to its current location, hindering its ability to flee from you.
Gravity Well.onHit: 3[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and the target cannot move or be pulled, pushed, or slid more than 2 squares from its current space until the end of your next turn.

Open the Way.name: Open the Way
Open the Way.flavor: Space ripples around you, letting you attack a foe beyond your reach, then drawing you to that enemy’s side.
Open the Way.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and you teleport to a square adjacent to the target.
Open the Way.effect: Before the attack, you teleport 5 squares.

Aspect of Squamous Horror.name: Aspect of Squamous Horror
Aspect of Squamous Horror.flavor: Your attack pushes your enemies back, wracking them with fear as you take on the form of a hideous scaled beast.
Aspect of Squamous Horror.target: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Aspect of Squamous Horror.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and you push the target 3 squares.
Aspect of Squamous Horror.effect: Choose one creature hit by the at-will attack. That creature moves its speed away from you by the safest route possible as a free action.

Dimensional Ambush.name: Dimensional Ambush
Dimensional Ambush.flavor: Your power bends the space around you, letting you strike a distant foe, then forcing that foe back as you appear at its side to strike again.
Dimensional Ambush.onHit: 5 + Constitution modifier psychic damage, and you slide the target 1 square.
Dimensional Ambush.onMiss: Half damage, and you slide the target 1 square.
Dimensional Ambush.effect: You teleport to a square adjacent to the space the target occupied before the slide. Make a secondary attack against the target.
Dimensional Ambush.secondaryOnHit: 3[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and you mark the target until the end of your next turn.
Dimensional Ambush.secondaryOnMiss: Half damage, and you mark the target until the end of your next turn.

Focus Bind.name: Focus Bind
Focus Bind.flavor: You tempt an enemy’s wrath as you focus your rage on it, setting up a confrontation that only one of you will survive.
Focus Bind.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage plus 3d10 psychic damage, and you mark the target until the end of the encounter. No other mark can supersede this mark unless you permit it.
Focus Bind.onMiss: Half damage, and you mark the target until the end of your next turn.
Focus Bind.effect: Until the mark imposed by this power ends, you are treated as if you are marked by the target, and whenever you or the target moves, the other can move the same number of squares as a free action or shift 1 square as a free action.

Temporal Regression.name: Temporal Regression
Temporal Regression.flavor: You slip back through time to escape the fight around you,choosing  a more advantageous position when you reappear
Temporal Regression.attack: Constitution vs. AC. Make the attack twice.
Temporal Regression.effect: At the start of your next turn, you are removed from play. At the start of your following turn, you reappear in an unoccupied space within 5 squares of the space you last occupied.

Deaden Blow.name: Deaden Blow
Deaden Blow.flavor: You sense the attack coming even before you see it, transforming your body to protect it from harm.
Deaden Blow.trigger: You take damage from an attack
Deaden Blow.effect: You are insubstantial until the end of your next turn.

Fearless Mindset.name: Fearless Mindset
Fearless Mindset.flavor: Your strength of mind lets you shrug off fear and your foes’ attempts to draw you into combat.
Fearless Mindset.effect: You are no longer marked, and you assume the fearless mind set stance. Until the stance ends, you gain a +4 power bonus to Will, a +5 power bonus to saving throws against fear effects, and you cannot be marked.

Mental Haven.name: Mental Haven
Mental Haven.flavor: By opening a portal into your own mind, you are temporarily shunted out of the world, then invigorated on your return.
Mental Haven.effect: You are removed from play. At the end of your next turn, you regain hit points equal to your bloodied value or you regain the use of an encounter power you have already used in this encounter. You then reappear in any unoccupied space within 5 squares of the space you last occupied.

Wings of Elevated Thought.name: Wings of Elevated Thought
Wings of Elevated Thought.flavor: Your power of thought lifts you free of the battlefield.
Wings of Elevated Thought.effect: You assume the wings of elevated thought stance. Until the stance ends, you gain a fly speed of 6, but you descend safely to the ground at the end of each of your turns.

Crushing Vortex.name: Crushing Vortex
Crushing Vortex.flavor: The power of your attack manifests as a force vortex that lashes out against another foe.
Crushing Vortex.effect: Your space and each square adjacent to you becomes a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. When a creature within the zone takes damage from an attack, each enemy within the zone takes force damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Double Vision.name: Double Vision
Double Vision.flavor: Your attack leaves a foe reeling, and lets you channel psionic power to fling yourself or the enemy across the battlefield.
Double Vision.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn. Also until the end of your next turn, when you or any ally hits the target, you can teleport yourself or the target 3 squares as a free action.

Iron Presence.name: Iron Presence
Iron Presence.flavor: A vicious strike magnifies your presence in your enemy’s mind, compelling it to focus on your threat.
Iron Presence.target: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Iron Presence.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and you mark the target until the end of the encounter, until you use this power again, or until you use your battlemind’s demand power.
Iron Presence.effect: Until the end of your next turn, your battlemind’s demand power targets two creatures in the burst.

Reality Shuffle.name: Reality Shuffle
Reality Shuffle.flavor: The force of your attack warps reality, leaving you and your enemy in different positions in the blink of an eye.
Reality Shuffle.onHit: 3[W] + Constitution modifier damage. You teleport the target 3 squares and then teleport 3 squares.

Blazing Offensive.name: Blazing Offensive
Blazing Offensive.flavor: You become a streak of flame that blurs across the battlefield, devastating your foes with psionic fire.
Blazing Offensive.effect: You shift three times your speed and make the following attack against one, two, or three creatures during this movement.

Stolen Vigor.name: Stolen Vigor
Stolen Vigor.flavor: Your weapon attack leaves a foe weakened, its stolen strength replenishing your own vigor.
Stolen Vigor.onHit: 4[W] + Constitution modifier damage. In addition, the target is weakened, and you regain 10 hit points at the start of each of the target’s turns (save ends both). While the target is adjacent to you, it takes a -2 penalty to saving throws against this effect.
Stolen Vigor.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is weakened until the end of your next turn. At the start of the target’s next turn, you regain 10 hit points.

Sublime Fury.name: Sublime Fury
Sublime Fury.flavor: Your attack incites a frenzy for battle that lets you lay waste to your foes.
Sublime Fury.effect: You assume the sublime fury stance. Until the stance ends, you take a -2 penalty to attack rolls and your unaugmented battlemind at-will melee attacks deal 2d6 extra damage. In addition, whenever you reduce a nonminion creature to 0 hit points, you make a melee basic attack as a free action.

Temporal Reiteration.name: Temporal Reiteration
Temporal Reiteration.flavor: Your strike pulls an enemy toward you, then forces it back to its previous location to relive your attack.
Temporal Reiteration.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and you teleport the target to a square adjacent to you.
Temporal Reiteration.effect: As a free action at either the start or the end of the target’s next turn, you teleport the target to the space it occupied when you targeted it with this power. Make a secondary attack against the target, even if you are no longer within melee reach.

Brandished Promise.name: Brandished Promise
Brandished Promise.flavor: You lash out at foes close by, hoping to draw their ire and their attacks to you.
Brandished Promise.target: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Brandished Promise.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and you mark the target until the end of your next turn.

Elusive Ghost.name: Elusive Ghost
Elusive Ghost.flavor: You strike, then teleport away to deny your enemies an easy counterattack.
Elusive Ghost.target: Each enemy you can see in the burst

Imprisoned Mind.name: Imprisoned Mind
Imprisoned Mind.flavor: Your attack binds your enemy’s thoughts, limiting its tactical movement.
Imprisoned Mind.onHit: 3[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and the target cannot shift until the end of your next turn. In addition, you gain a +3 power bonus to opportunity attack rolls against the target until the end of your next turn.

Obsidian Shield (Battlemind).name: Obsidian Shield (Battlemind)
Obsidian Shield (Battlemind).flavor: A shadowy shield presses your foes and can hinder their movement.
Obsidian Shield (Battlemind).onHit: 3[W] + Constitution modifier necrotic and psychic damage. In addition, if the target moves more than 2 squares away from you on its next turn, it takes 10 necrotic and psychic damage.

Darting Grace Strike.name: Darting Grace Strike
Darting Grace Strike.flavor: You flit across the battlefield, avoiding your enemies as your attacks grant you a lethal grace.
Darting Grace Strike.onHit: 3[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and the target is dazed (save ends). If the target is already dazed, the attack deals 5 extra damage.
Darting Grace Strike.effect: You shift 4 squares, and the triggering enemy grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.
Darting Grace Strike.requirement: The power Darting Grace Strike must be active in order to use this power.
Darting Grace Strike.trigger: An enemy misses you with an attack

Killing Wind Assault.name: Killing Wind Assault
Killing Wind Assault.flavor: You vanish before your enemies’ eyes, becoming the unseen wind that unleashes death on the battlefield.
Killing Wind Assault.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +4 power bonus to speed, and you are invisible while moving.
Killing Wind Assault.onHit: 5[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.

Many Doors Curse.name: Many Doors Curse
Many Doors Curse.flavor: Your attack binds the target to you, wracking it with pain as you fling it across the battlefield.
Many Doors Curse.effect: The target is subject to your many doors curse (save ends). While the target is affected by your many doors curse, the first time each turn that the target takes damage from an attack, you can teleport it to a square adjacent to you or an ally you can see as a free action. When you teleport the target this way, it takes 10 psychic damage.

Omniscient Strike.name: Omniscient Strike
Omniscient Strike.flavor: As your chosen foe prepares to strike, you sabotage its attack by making a vicious attack of your own.
Omniscient Strike.trigger: An enemy marked by you targets you with a melee attack
Omniscient Strike.effect: If you have no power points remaining, you regain 2 power points.
Omniscient Strike.attack: Constitution vs. AC. You have combat advantage for this attack.
Omniscient Strike.onHit: 4[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and the target is stunned (save ends).
Omniscient Strike.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).

Shade Strike.name: Shade Strike
Shade Strike.flavor: Wisps of shadow bind you to your foe, obscuring its attempts to strike back at you.
Shade Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage. Until you end your turn in a square not adjacent to the target, you and allies adjacent to you have concealment against the target.

Ghost Jaunt.name: Ghost Jaunt
Ghost Jaunt.flavor: You vanish from an enemy’s sight, slipping past other foes as you move into attack position.
Ghost Jaunt.effect: You become invisible to the target, then shift 5 squares to a square adjacent to the target. This invisibility last until the end of your turn or until you make an attack.

Living Shard.name: Living Shard
Living Shard.sourceRef: Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook
Living Shard.flavor: Your strike embeds a crystalline fragment in your enemy’s flesh, overwhelming it with psionic energy channeled from the Living Gate.
Living Shard.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and the target is dazed and gains vulnerable 5 psychic (save ends both).
Living Shard.onMiss: Half damage, and the target gains vulnerable 5 psychic (save ends).
Living Shard.effect: Until the vulnerability ends, the target takes 10 radiant damage whenever it uses a psychic power.
